data.name: Theseus Protocol
data.detailed_description:
Follow us on Discord!

Theseus Protocol is a deck build game with a rogue-like gameplay that provide randomness in every adventures. Every time a player reborn, it will face a new set of challenges. During battle, you can try out different build with variety of card and weapon. And you will get strengthened whether you won or got defeated.

You can select three characters with different combat style, each has his or her own story line and connection with the world. Theseus Protocol provides a SCI-FI world for you to explore. Every tiny detail in the game provide information for revealing the truth. You will walk between the disparate upper and lower city, travel among ancient battlefield covered with yellow sand and heavily fortified factories. In this adventure, you will also meet friends, or, maybe enemies. Ultimately, you can put all the information you collect together and discover the cruelest truth of this world.

Game Features:
-Dystopia World with Hidden Secrets.
The rich and powerful in upper city nourishes cruel and crazy conspiracies. The dingy and rainy lower city entrenched different gangs and clans. And you, known as “Prometheus”, will make decisions that alter the fate of humankind.



-Can’t clear your hand？Try charge your guns with your card.
The guns on your hand is not for decorations. Throw the less efficient cards in your gun and aim at your enemies. Use your cards in a different way, and sometimes “trash” can fight for you in another way.



-Abandoning the traditional stand and attack, try moving to make tactical advantage.
Nobody wants to be a punching bag, so you can dodge the incoming attack by switching your position. When facing multiple targets, you can even force them to crash into each other and make some serious damage.

-Nonlinear narrative make the game process more intriguing.
Fragmented narrative means you can acquire information via different scenario. As you explore deeper through this adventure, the history and the truth become more and more vivid. While providing immersive game experience, we hope you can also have the sense of finding your own recognition of yourselves.

data.short_description: Theseus Protocol is a SCI-FI DBG strategy game. In this highly intelligent time, you are forced to adapt to the laws of survival and become stronger in battles. Seeking for the truth, you must travel across variety of novel scenes to reveal the full story by collecting fragments of information.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz(64bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600(AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz(64bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970(Dedicated 4GB AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
